SENT.plain: A congenital cholesteatoma or epidermoid is a benign mass that causes devastating effects if left untreated
An unusual case with a congenital cholesteatoma located in the mastoid region complicated by epidural abscess, sinus thrombosis, and cutaneous fistula is presented
The patient had normal otologic findings and had no neurologic deficit
A review of the literature found no report of a similar case
